arts.ttl: Mainz strengthen top-four hold with impressive win at Gladbach
arts.sum: The goal, Amiri's second in as many games, was a fitting way to cap off an impressive performance from both the player and his team, who climb to third, overnight at least. Both teams entered the match in good form, having collected 13 points from their previous seven games, setting the stage for an intriguing battle at Borussia-Park.

arts.ttl: Mainz climb to third with win over Gladbach
arts.sum: Mainz won their fourth game in a row, this time beating Borussia Mönchengladbach 3-1 to move up to third in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Gladbach vs Mainz Prediction: Team News, Predicted Lineups and Where To Watch
arts.sum: Gladbach, currently sitting in eighth place in the Bundesliga, welcomes fourth-placed Mainz on Friday, March 7th, 2025, at 19:30 GMT. Both teams are vying for a coveted Champions League spot, setting ...

arts.ttl: Gladbach vs. Mainz preview: Two European hopefuls lock horns
arts.sum: Two European hopefuls will face off when Borussia Mönchengladbach welcome Mainz 05 to Borussia-Park for Friday’s Bundesliga encounter.

arts.ttl: Press conference summary - Gladbach vs Mainz
arts.sum: You want to be up-to-date for Bundesliga matchday 25? Find out what happened at the press conferences for the game Gladbach vs Mainz on Friday.

arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
